pl.ais.commons.domain.specification.composite

Class OrSpecification<C>

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.ais.commons.domain.specification.composite.OrSpecification<C>
  • Type Parameters:
    C - determines the type of candidate
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    CompositeSpecification<C>, Specification<C>

    public final class OrSpecification<C>
extends Object
    Composite specification being disjunction of other specifications.

    1.0.1
    Author:
    Warlock, AIS.PL

        public <T extends C> boolean isSatisfiedBy(T candidate)

        Type Parameters:
        T - determines the upper bound for the candidate type
        Parameters:
        candidate - the candidate to verify
        Returns:
        true if this specification is matched by the candidate, false otherwise
